text: The 1902 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1902 college football season. Head coach J. B. Craig led the team for the third year. Geneva finished the season with a record of 7–0, claiming the team's first undefeated season. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1902 Geneva Covenanters football team
